sensors

Interface LightSensorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineFollowController, ObstructionController, ObstructionControllerFAULT

    public interface LightSensorListener
    This is the light sensor listener interface
    Since:
    01-04-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Bezem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void lightSensorChanged(Position position, UpdatingSensor updatingsensor, float oldValue, float newValue)
      When this class is being implemented, this class will be called upon when one of the light sensors' state changes.

    • Method Detail

      • lightSensorChanged

        void lightSensorChanged(Position position,
                      UpdatingSensor updatingsensor,
                      float oldValue,
                      float newValue)
        When this class is being implemented, this class will be called upon when one of the light sensors' state changes.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the sensor used
        updatingsensor - the sensor that is been updated
        oldValue - the value before the change
        newValue - the value after the change
